Let's dive right in!

This post will get new users of `R` up and running quickly.

### Getting Started

If you've never used R before, then you are in for a treat! The awesome people at RStudio are doing incredible work to help users of R be productive. RStudio is an open source (+commercial editions) Integrated Development Environment (IDE).
